title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 367: Featuring T.J. Oshie
description:
On Episode 367 of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by T.J. Oshie. T.J. joined (1:17:29) to talk about his famous pregame handshakes, playing with Ovechkin, the Olympic Shootout and tons more. But first, the guys open the show talking about their trip to Minnesota and the coldest Winter Classic ever. The guys then react to the World Juniors cancellation news and give their take on Brad Marchand’s Olympic comments. The guys wrap up talking some hockey news, including how hot the Penguins are right now.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
